azurerm_application_insights_analytics_i.description: Manages an Application Insights Analytics Item component.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Application Insights Analytics Item. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

application_insights_id.description: The ID of the Application Insights component on which the Analytics Item exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

type.description: The type of Analytics Item to create. Can be one of `query`, `function`, `folder`, `recent`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

scope.description: The scope for the Analytics Item. Can be `shared` or `user`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created. Must be `shared` for functions.

content.description: The content for the Analytics Item, for example the query text if `type` is `query`.

function_alias.description: The alias to use for the function. Required when `type` is `function`.

id.description: The ID of the Application Insights Analytics Item.

time_created.description: A string containing the time the Analytics Item was created.

time_modified.description: A string containing the time the Analytics Item was last modified.

version.description: A string indicating the version of the query format

create.description: Used when creating the Application Insights Analytics Item.

update.description: Used when updating the Application Insights Analytics Item.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Application Insights Analytics Item.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Application Insights Analytics Item.
